meanings.sent1: The cake batter became eggier after adding more eggs.
meanings.sent2: The omelette was much eggier than the scrambled eggs.
meanings.sent3: The eggier pancakes were a hit at the breakfast party.
meanings.sent4: The morning sky had an eggier hue as the sun rose.
meanings.sent5: The eggier smell in the kitchen made everyone crave breakfast.

meanings.sent1: The soup tasted eggier after the chef added more eggs.
meanings.sent2: The eggier the dish, the more it reminded me of breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The eggier ice cream flavor surprised and delighted the customers.
meanings.sent4: The eggier aroma from the kitchen filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The eggier taste of the custard lingered on my taste buds.

meanings.sent1: The eggier hen in the coop was the most productive.
meanings.sent2: The eggier birds were always busy in the mornings.
meanings.sent3: The eggier chickens seemed to have a daily routine of laying eggs.
meanings.sent4: The eggier ducks waddled proudly after laying their eggs.
meanings.sent5: The eggier behavior of the geese signaled the start of spring.
